channel.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_OperatingSystem on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Software_Component_OperatingSystem on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Component_OperatingSystem
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Component_OperatingSystem Datatype Description SoftLayer_Software_Component_OperatingSystem extends the [[SoftLayer_Software_Component]] data type to include operating system specific properties. Local hardwareId Hardware Identification Number for the server this Software Component is installed upon. Type: integer id An ID number identifying this Software Component (Software Installation) Type: integer manufacturerActivationCode The manufacturer code that is needed to activate a license. Type: string manufacturerLicenseInstance A license key for this specific installation of software, if it is needed.
